dcterms:description: A citation network dataset where each node corresponds to a paper, and edges signify citation relationships. The dataset includes node attributes derived from paper titles and classifies papers into five research topics.
dcterms:title: ACMv9

dcterms:creator: J. Tang
J. Zhang
L. Yao
J. Li
L. Zhang
Z. Su
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset similar to ACMv9, representing another set of academic papers and their citation relationships, with node attributes based on paper titles and classified into five research topics.
dcterms:title: Citationv1

dcterms:creator: J. Tang
J. Zhang
L. Yao
J. Li
L. Zhang
Z. Su
dcterms:description: A citation network dataset that includes nodes representing academic papers and edges indicating citation relationships, with node attributes derived from paper titles and classified into five research topics.
dcterms:title: DBLPv7

dcterms:creator: J. Li
X. Hu
J. Tang
H. Liu
dcterms:description: A social network dataset representing bloggers and their friendships, with nodes corresponding to bloggers and edges representing undirected friendships. Node attributes are derived from bloggers' self-descriptions.
dcterms:title: Blog1

dcterms:creator: J. Li
X. Hu
J. Tang
H. Liu
dcterms:description: Another social network dataset similar to Blog1, representing bloggers and their friendships, with nodes as bloggers and edges as undirected friendships. Attributes are derived from bloggers' self-descriptions.
dcterms:title: Blog2
